toads Compound List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
  • BaseStar (The base class for handling stars. Used by all matching routines)
  • Component (Store the necessary components for weighting and computing the stacking)
  • CountedRef (An implementation of "smart pointers" that counts references to an object. The obejct it "points" to has to derive from RefCount)
  • Daophot (A wrapper to most DAOPHOT routines)
  • DbImage
  • DbImageList (DbImages can be globally located and stored into image lists)
  • DImage (A double precision image type)
  • FastFinder (Fast locator in starlists)
  • FitsHeader (Fits files and header keys)
  • FitsImage (This class enables basic manipulation of images stored in fits files)
  • FitsImageArray (Array of Image in a FITS file)
  • FitsKey (Auxilary class for accessing fits header keys)
  • FitsParallelSlices (Several fits images of the same size to be processed in parallel)
  • FitsSet (Container for fits files that have same sizes, filter, and come from the same chip within a mosaic)
  • FitsSlice (Memory saving traversal of a fits image)
  • Frame (Rectangle with sides parallel to axes)
  • FringeUtils (Utility class for fringe analysis)
  • Gtransfo (A virtual (interface) class for geometric transformations)
  • GtransfoCub (Implements the cubic transformations (20 real coefficients))
  • GtransfoIdentity (A do-nothing transformation. It anyway has dummy routines to mimick a GTransfo)
  • GtransfoLin (Implements the linear transformations (6 real coefficients))
  • GtransfoLinRot (Just here to provide a specialized constructor, and fit)
  • GtransfoLinScale (Just here to provide specialized constructors. GtransfoLin fit routine)
  • GtransfoLinShift (Just here to provide a specialized constructor, and fit)
  • GtransfoQuad (Implements the quadratic transformations (12 real coefficients))
  • Image (Class for the basic manipulation of images)
  • ImageBack (Image Back class to compute an image of the background)
  • ImageGtransfo
  • ImageSubtraction (For subtracting images using the Alard kernel fit technique. A basic assumption: Ref and New are already geometrically aligned)
  • ImageSum (A class that handles coadding. Shift and coadd is handled by)
  • JimStar (Jim Calibration Star)
  • Kernel (An odd size DImage addressed with (0,0) at center allows quick computation of convolution like operations)
  • KernelFit (Kernel fitting by least squares)
  • LightCurve (The same FiducialStar monitored many nights)
  • LightCurveBuilder (Lightcurve builder for one band. Execute different types of photometry)
  • LightCurveGuru (Main lightcurve builder for all bands)
  • NamedValue (Very simple stuff to associate names and values. Used to I/O transfos to fits headers)
  • NewSub (Handling of an actual subtraction (shift-coadd-subtract-detect). See Syntax of the "subfile" for the way to drive it)
  • Night (Version of the ReducedImage, quicker, but with more memory)
  • NightElement (A template to use when an element belongs to a night)
  • NightSet (A class representing a set of overlapping images of the same night, same instrument and same filter)
  • Point (A point in a plane)
  • PsfMatch (A class that wraps calls to KernelFit. Used both to carry out subtractions (ImageSubtraction) and just kernel fitting (for the light curve))
  • PsfStars (A class to select PSF stars from different ways)
  • ReducedImage (A handle to access data associated to an image: the fits file, the catalog, the dead and satur frames, and a set of 'scalars' such as seeing, saturation level &co)
  • SEStar (SExtractor star)
  • SimultaneousFit (Simultaneous fitting of Vignets)
  • Stamp (An odd size DImage extracted from an Image, centered on (xc,yc))
  • StampList (Nothing but a list of Stamps)
  • StarList (Lists of Stars)
  • StarMatch (A pair of stars, usually belonging to different images)
  • Sub (Handling of an actual subtraction (shift-coadd-subtract-detect). See Syntax of the "subfile" for the way to drive it)
  • SubImage (A class that allows to cut a subimage from a ReducedImage)
  • TanPix2RaDec (The transformation that handles pix to sideral transfos (Gnomonic, possibly with polynomial distortions))
  • TanRaDec2Pix (This one is the Tangent Plane (called gnomonic) projection (from celestial sphere to tangent plane))
  • TransformedImage (Class that operates the transformation of a ReducedImage (image(s) + list))
  • Vignet (Similar to Kernel, but resizeable and contains some kind of Point)
Generated at Sun Feb 8 18:22:49 2004 for toads by 1.2.6 written by Dimitri van Heesch, © 1997-2001
